text: Barbara Ann Curran (August 26, 1940 â€“ January 29, 2022) was an American Republican politician and lawyer. She was born in New York City. Curran was a member of the New Jersey General Assembly from 1974 until 1980. She was a Judge of the New Jersey Superior Court between 1993 until 2000. Curran died on January 29, 2022 in Union County, New Jersey at the age of 81.Barbara Curran, former assemblywoman, dies at 81 ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2022 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:American judges Category:Lawyers from New York City Category:Politicians from New York City Category:Politicians from New Jersey Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Barbara A. Curran
